multi_addition(X,Y,Z) :- number(X,X2),number(Y,Y2), Z is X2+Y2.
query(multi_addition([img_7,img_9],[img_3,img_1,img_2],Z)).

% Define number predicate to convert a list of image IDs to an integer
number([], 0).
number([H|T], N) :-
    digit(H, D),
    number(T, NT),
    length(T, L),
    N is D * (10 ^ L) + NT.

multi_addition(X,Y,Z) :- number(X,X2), number(Y,Y2), Z is X2+Y2.

query(multi_addition([img_7,img_9],[img_3,img_1,img_2],Z)).
